channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fiji Airways to adopt American Airlines AAdvantage as its loyalty program
item.description: At some point in the next year, Fiji Airways will make American Airlines’ AAdvantage its loyalty program, the two airlines announced this week. Passen...

item.title: Southwest sale: 20% off flights August through November
item.description: Southwest Airlines is offering a 20% discount across its network on flights slated from late summer through late fall. Simply use the code “MAX20” and...

item.title: Book fast: Summer award night availability at Conrad Bora Bora Nui
item.description: One of TPG’s favorite Hilton properties in the world has some incredible award night availability this summer and early fall. Move fast to make the be...

item.title: How to earn and use the Southwest Companion Pass
